title: Lachlan Astfalck
text:
I am a Research Fellow for the TIDE ARC ITRH in the School of Physics, Mathematics and Computing at The University of Western Australia.
I am a research statistician with interest in both methodological and applied research. From a methodological standpoint, I have interest in spectral analysis, emulation of engineering computer models, and many aspects of uncertainty quantification. I also do lots of applied work in oceanography and hydrodynamics.
I was previously a Research Fellow in the School of Earth and Environment at the University of Leeds where I worked on uncertainty quantification in paleo-climate glaciology.
I have also worked in ecological restoration, materials engineering, prognostics and health management, and have consulted for the Australian Wildlife Conservancy.

title: Lachlan Astfalck
text:
I am a Research Fellow for the TIDE ARC ITRH in the School of Physics, Mathematics and Computing at The University of Western Australia.
I am a research statistician with interest in both methodological and applied research. From a methodological standpoint, I have interest in spectral analysis, emulation of engineering computer models, and many aspects of uncertainty quantification. I also do lots of applied work in oceanography and hydrodynamics.
I was previously a Research Fellow in the School of Earth and Environment at the University of Leeds where I worked on uncertainty quantification in paleo-climate glaciology.
I have also worked in ecological restoration, materials engineering, prognostics and health management, and have consulted for the Australian Wildlife Conservancy.

title: Lachlan Astfalck
text:
Selected Papers
Astfalck LC, Sykulski AM, Cripps EJ. (2024). ‘’Debiasing Welch’s Method for Spectral Density Estimation’’, Biometrika, asae033. [Available here.]
Astfalck, LC, Williamson, DB, Gandy, N, Gregoire, LJ, & Ivanovic, RF. (2024). ‘’Coexchangeable Process Modeling for Uncertainty Quantification in Joint Climate Reconstruction’’. Journal of the American Statistical Association, 1-14. [Available here.]
Astfalck, LC, Bird, CR, & Williamson, DB. (2024). ‘’Generalised Bayes Linear Inference’’. Submitted to The Journal of the Royal Statistical Society: Series B. [Available here.]

title: Lachlan Astfalck
text:
Contact
Please contact me via email, I very seldom check any social media channels, including LinkedIn. I am accepting research students in statistics and oceanography, don’t be shy in reaching out. I also have some capacity for statistical/data-science consulting or other applied research should my expertise be of interest.
